text: Abaffe tolaba (ggwe Nabbi Muhammad) abananfunsi abagamba bannabwe abaakafuwala mu bayudaaya nti singa munaaba mugobeddwa naffe tujja kugenda nammwe. Era tetulikkiriza kigambo kyamuntu yenna ku bikwata ku mmwe. Era bwemulirwanyisibwa tugenda kubataasa. Ne Katonda akakasa nti mazima ddala baali balimba
